page.title: 10CROYLAND PARK AMENITIES
page.content: Croyland Park is a large expanse of grass with a stream running through it which is presently being modified by workmen. Nearby there is a large indoor swimming pool which is very popular amongst the residents of Wellingborough. A good quality football pitch, with changing rooms, can also be found there. Although there are playground facilities for children there are few amenities for adult recreation and this is demonstrated by two delapidated and unusable tennis courts. Overall, Croyland Park provides adequate recreational services to most of Wellingborough and, as the main park in the town, it is a pleasant and quiet area.
